      • getAllUsers

        public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()

        getAllUsers method

        The method getAllUsers calls on the repository to retrieve a list of all users that exist on the database
        Returns:
        List the returned list of users for top ten.

      • saveUser

        public void saveUser(User user)

        Save User method

        The method saves user to database, adding the value via UserRepository.
        Parameters:
        user - user to be saved to database

      • getTopTen

        public java.util.List<User> getTopTen()

        getTopTen method

        The method getTopTen retrieves the 10 ten users from the database based on their point totals.
        Returns:
        the returned list of users for top ten in and ArrayList.

      • login

        public User login(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)

        Login method

        This method Login allows users to login into their account. By taking username and password, login finds the appropriate row from the database by calling UserRepository. if the User exists, access to the user's information and actions will be granted.
        Parameters:
        username - user that is being looked up for login
        password - password entered to see if it matches the user password
        Returns:
        User the returned user if it exists

      • getRankAndUser

        public java.lang.Object getRankAndUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns an object that contains the user's rank in the leader board, name, and points.

        This method is the called by the end point for getting a single user's rank in the leader board.

        Parameters:
        username - name of the user that the requester want the rank of.
        Returns:
        Returns an object that contains a user's rank in the leader board, name, and points.

      • findUserByUsername

        public User findUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)

        Login method

        This method returns a user with a specific username.
        Parameters:
        username - username that is being used to find user on database
        Returns:
        User the returned user if it exists
